Welcome to ETC!!
 This is a YouTube channel for all things Entertainment, Tech, and Culture complete with a hefty dose of sarcasm!
 Weekly shows include:
 - News Squirts
 - Tech Tuesday
 - Weekly Weird News
 - T.U.G.S. - Totally Uninformed Gaming Show
 - News Dump!
